caption.p: (A) mass of food group consumption as a%-age of total consumption reported in the Indian Migration Survey (reference); (B) GHG emissions associated with production of food groups in India per hectare, (C) per kg yield, (D) per 1000Â kcal. (*Other Cereals: includes bajra, barley, maize, ragi and jowar; ** Other Pulses: includes black, red and green gram; *** Crops for vegetable oils: includes coconut, rapeseed, soybean, safflower, sesamum, sunflower).
